items.name: Grilled Chicken
items.description: Tender grilled chicken breast served with a side of mashed potatoes and steamed vegetables.

items.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
items.description: A healthy stir fry with mixed vegetables, tofu, and a light soy-based sauce, served over jasmine rice.

items.name: Beef Burger
items.description: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and special sauce, served with crispy fries.
